titles.title: Transparency in Reporting of Adversarial Contributions to Education Act
Transparency in Reporting of Adversarial Contributions to Education Act
A bill to ensure that parents are aware of foreign influence in their child's public school, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
